name: Sacrosanct (itch)
description:
Veronika's dark gift was neither earned nor given, but a consequence of a bigger picture she has no stakes in. In life an Anarch by heart, in unlife a Ventrue pawn, the picture painted by the whims of her Sire. This is a snippet of a moment in the life of a bearer of an uneventful fate.

☥

E - to interact

Ctrl - to crouch

Jump near edge to climb

A - D to shimmy left or right

☥
